title: Is there any restriction on the size, format, or resolution of the file to be attached to a multimedia message?
answer: [If an audio or video file exceeds the maximum size (generally 300 KB) allowed by your service provider, it cannot be attached to a multimedia message. If an image is too large, it will be automatically compressed before being attached to the message. As a result, the resolution of the image attached to the message decreases.]()
